content: I'm new to Polonius and I'm looking if it's possible to combine it into our rust visualization project to enable automatic borrow/move detection. However, according to the blog, it seems like Polonius only supports analyzing borrows but doesn't support moves and initialization. I'm just curious about why moves are not currently supported. Is there a possible way to detect a move operation that we can make use of? Please let me know if you have any ideas or suggestions! Thank you ;)
there has been some progress since the blog post, if you're talking about this one: in particular, there's already in-progress work on move/init analysis by @Amanda Stjerna in the polonius repository
Thank you for letting me know! I'll check the codes regarding that :smile:
jesssleepy has marked this topic as resolved.
